paragraphs.text: At the age of 12, I won my very own computer in a story writing competition. This ignited my self taught journey into programming. A highlight being creating educational software together with my father that taught children how to spell correctly in a playful manner.

paragraphs.html: When I started my music studies, I left programming for a few years. But I had always felt it would come back one day. In 2015, I got an idea for a generative visual, which later evolved into FLUX. This reignited my journey into computers and technology..

paragraphs.text: Spotting the great potential technology and art combined can have, Remco van Dun, Sjoerd Eikenaar and I founded NONLINE. A company that serves as an outlet for our digital creations. Our game FUNGI was released and was played by thousands of people online, but was discontinued in 2020.
Currently, I'm working as a developer at Studio Nul games, with our first game News Tower set to release this year.
